metadata.title: CVE-2015-0258 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple incomplete blacklist vulnerabilities in the avatar uploadfunctionality in manageuser.php in Collabtive before 2.1 allow remoteauthenticated users to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with a(1) .php3, (2) .php4, (3) .php5, or (4) .phtml extension.

criterions.comment: collabtive: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
